title: Gumtree
description: Gumtree, an online marketplace, utilizes a vibrant color palette that reflects its dynamic and welcoming environment. The primary colors include a refreshing green (#72EF36) symbolizing growth and eco-friendliness, a deep mute purple (#3B3141) conveying reliability and sophistication, and a subtle beige (#F0ECE6) adding warmth to its visual identity. These colors are prominently featured in its brand rebranding showcased on Behance.
